class.name: LoginOptions
class.javadoc:
Implements the ASN.1 KDCOptions type. KDCOptions ::= KerberosFlags -- reserved(0), -- forwardable(1), -- forwarded(2), -- proxiable(3), -- proxy(4), -- allow-postdate(5), -- postdated(6), -- unused7(7), -- renewable(8), -- unused9(9), -- unused10(10), -- opt-hardware-auth(11), -- unused12(12), -- unused13(13), -- 15 is reserved for canonicalize -- unused15(15), -- 26 was unused in 1510 -- disable-transited-check(26), -- renewable-ok(27), -- enc-tkt-in-skey(28), -- renew(30), -- validate(31) KerberosFlags ::= BIT STRING (SIZE (32..MAX)) -- minimum number of bits shall be sent, -- but no fewer than 32

This definition reflects the Network Working Group RFC 4120 specification available at http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4120.txt.
